about_the_game:
"If my answers scare you, stop asking the dreadful questions. Comprende, amigo?"

Our days, godforsaken place, somewhere on the Mexican border.
The sheriff, who had packed his belongings in a cardboard box a long time ago, was going to vacate the office and take a long-awaited rest, while this case was supposed to be the final, unremarkable chord of his career.

Follow the protagonists of this noir story all the way down the road and find out what really happened at the bar and why even the rugged Sheriff was terrified and truly frightened of what had happened here. Here, in the big Kahuna bar.

Game Features

  • Completely hand-drawn art
  • Western style dialogues
  • The original noir visual novel

Game does not have any sexual or erotic implication. Game have cartoon images of genitals, but they are used only as comic characters and they have clothes, hairstyles, etc.
In our game, we do not hint, say or show any sexual acts, penetrations or other things with an erotic component.

name: COCKHEAD: BIG KAHUNA BAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 9600GT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
